00038     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT /* see VCLForwards.h */ >
00039     class coordinate_matrix
00040     {
00041     public:
00042       typedef scalar<typename viennacl::tools::CHECK_SCALAR_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENT<SCALARTYPE>::ResultType>   value_type;
00043       
00045       coordinate_matrix() : _rows(0), _cols(0), _nonzeros(0) { viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init(); }
00046       
00053       explicit coordinate_matrix(unsigned int rows, unsigned int cols, unsigned int nonzeros = 0) : 
00054         _rows(rows), _cols(cols), _nonzeros(nonzeros), _internal_nonzeros(viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(nonzeros, ALIGNMENT))
00055       {
00056         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init();
00057         if (nonzeros > 0)
00058         {
00059           _coord_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * 2 * _internal_nonzeros);
00060           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * _internal_nonzeros);
00061         }
00062       }
00063         
00065       void reserve(unsigned int new_nonzeros)
00066       {
00067         if (new_nonzeros > _nonzeros)
00068         {
00069           _internal_nonzeros = viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(new_nonzeros, ALIGNMENT);
00070           viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _coord_buffer_old = _coord_buffer;
00071           viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements_old = _elements;
00072           _coord_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * 2 * _internal_nonzeros);
00073           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * _internal_nonzeros);
00074           
00075           cl_int err;
00076           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _coord_buffer_old, _coord_buffer, 0, 0, sizeof(unsigned int) * 2 * _nonzeros, 0, NULL, NULL);
00077           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00078           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements_old, _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_nonzeros, 0, NULL, NULL);
00079           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00080 
00081           //new memory must be padded with zeros:
00082           std::vector<long> temp(_internal_nonzeros - _nonzeros);
00083           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _coord_buffer_old, _coord_buffer, 0, _nonzeros, sizeof(unsigned int) * 2 * temp.size(), 0, NULL, NULL);
00084           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00085           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements_old, _elements, 0, _nonzeros, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), 0, NULL, NULL);
00086           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00087         }
00088       }

00096       void resize(unsigned int new_size1, unsigned int new_size2, bool preserve = true)
00097       {
00098         if (new_size1 > 0 && new_size2 > 0)
00099         {
00100           if (new_size1 > _rows) //enlarge buffer
00101           {
00102             //no need to do anything...
00103           }
00104           else if (new_size1 < _rows) //reduce buffer
00105           {
00106             //no need to reduce buffer
00107             
00108             //TODO: discard entries in the matrix that are beyond the allowed sizes
00109           }
00110           
00111           _rows = new_size1;
00112           _cols = new_size2;
00113         }
00114       }

00146     //provide copy-operation:
00154     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00155     void copy(const CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix,
00156                      coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix )
00157     {
00158       if ( cpu_matrix.size1() > 0 && cpu_matrix.size2() > 0 )
00159       {
00160         gpu_matrix.resize(static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size1()), static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size2()), false);
00161         
00162         //determine nonzeros:
00163         unsigned int num_entries = 0;
00164         for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator1 row_it = cpu_matrix.begin1();
00165               row_it != cpu_matrix.end1();
00166               ++row_it)
00167         {
00168           for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator2 col_it = row_it.begin();
00169                 col_it != row_it.end();
00170                 ++col_it)
00171           {
00172             ++num_entries;
00173           }
00174         }
00175         
00176         //set up matrix entries:
00177         gpu_matrix._internal_nonzeros = num_entries;
00178         if (num_entries % ALIGNMENT != 0)
00179           gpu_matrix._internal_nonzeros = ((num_entries / ALIGNMENT) + 1) * ALIGNMENT;
00180 
00181         std::vector<unsigned int> coord_buffer(2*gpu_matrix._internal_nonzeros);
00182         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> elements(gpu_matrix._internal_nonzeros);
00183         
00184         unsigned int data_index = 0;
00185         
00186         for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator1 row_it = cpu_matrix.begin1();
00187               row_it != cpu_matrix.end1();
00188               ++row_it)
00189         {
00190           for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator2 col_it = row_it.begin();
00191                 col_it != row_it.end();
00192                 ++col_it)
00193           {
00194             coord_buffer[2*data_index] = static_cast<unsigned int>(col_it.index1());
00195             coord_buffer[2*data_index + 1] = static_cast<unsigned int>(col_it.index2());
00196             elements[data_index] = *col_it;
00197             ++data_index;
00198           }
00199         }
00200         
00201         gpu_matrix._coord_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, coord_buffer);
00202         gpu_matrix._elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, elements);
00203         
00204         gpu_matrix._nonzeros = num_entries;
00205       }
00206     }

00220     //gpu to cpu:
00230     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00231     void copy(const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix,
00232                      CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix )
00233     {
00234       if ( cpu_matrix.size1() > 0 && cpu_matrix.size2() > 0 )
00235       {
00236         cpu_matrix.resize(gpu_matrix.size1(), gpu_matrix.size2());
00237         
00238         //get raw data from memory:
00239         std::vector<unsigned int> coord_buffer(2*gpu_matrix.nnz());
00240         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> elements(gpu_matrix.nnz());
00241         
00242         //std::cout << "GPU nonzeros: " << gpu_matrix.nnz() << std::endl;
00243         
00244         cl_int err;
00245         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle12(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)* 2 *gpu_matrix.nnz(), &(coord_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00246         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00247         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*gpu_matrix.nnz(), &(elements[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00248         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00249         viennacl::ocl::finish();
00250         
00251         //fill the cpu_matrix:
00252         for (unsigned int index = 0; index < gpu_matrix.nnz(); ++index)
00253         {
00254           cpu_matrix(coord_buffer[2*index], coord_buffer[2*index+1]) = elements[index];
00255         }
00256       }
00257     }
